mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( user_num, user_id, user_password, user_name, user_phone, user_email, user_nickname, drawn_user, user_create_at, user_level, user_image, user_banner ) VALUES ( SEQ_USERS.NEXTVAL, #{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userNickname}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{userNickname}, 'N', SYSDATE, 1, NULL, NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT user_num AS userNum, user_id AS userId, user_password AS userPassword, user_name AS userName, user_phone AS userPhone, user_email AS userEmail, user_nickname AS userNickname, drawn_user AS drawnUser, user_create_at AS userCreateAt, user_level AS userLevel FROM USERS WHERE user_email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE user_nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE user_email = #{email}
